translated: Michael John Smith (Mike Smith says) is an American astronaut who was born April 30th, 1945 and died in the Challenger disaster of January 28, 1986 to 40 years.
original: Michael John Smith (dit Mike Smith) est un astronaute américain né le 30 avril 1945 et mort dans la Catastrophe de Challenger le 28 janvier 1986 à 40 ans.
